content:
## n8n@0.75.0 For a comprehensive list of changes, check out the [commits](https://github.com/n8n-io/n8n/compare/n8n@0.74.0...n8n@0.75.0) for this version.
**Release date:** 2020-07-26 - New nodes - Box - Box Trigger - CrateDB - Jira Trigger - Enhanced nodes - GitLab - Nextcloud - Pipedrive - QuestDB - Webhooks now support OPTIONS request
